name: Mini Banana Bread Loaves
author: MCKUHN
summary: Delicious recipe I created when I had no eggs but wanted banana loaf for my new mini loaf pans!
ingredients: ¼ cup quick-cooking oats, or to taste
½ cup raisins, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Combine flours, oats, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a medium bowl
Mash bananas into the dry ingredients
Combine sugars and margarine in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Mix in milk and vanilla extract
Add the flour mixture and raisins; mix well
Pour batter into 4 mini silicone loaf pans
Place loaf pans on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes
